# Technology (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** [[Craft (Skill)|Craft]] and [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (steamcraft) are always considered class skills, and checks receive a +2 sacred bonus.

**Technology Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Magic Weapon (Spell)|Magic Weapon]]****:** Weapon gains a +1 bonus.

**2** **[[Find Traps (Spell)|Find Traps]]****:** Notice traps as a rogue does.

**3** **[[Source of Knowledge (Spell)|Source of Knowledge]]****:** Gain a +4 insight bonus to one [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] skill check.

**4** **[[Summon Firearm (Spell)|Summon Firearm]]****:** You summon a prepared firearm directly to your hand.

**5 Iron Shape:** As *[[Stone Shape (Spell)|stone shape]]*, only iron may be manipulated

**6** **[[Aspect of the Iron Knight (Spell)|Aspect of the Iron Knight]]****:** You empower yourself with aspects of the iron golem.

**7** **[[Summon Golem (Spell)|Summon Golem]]****:** You summon a particular golem to aid you for a short time.

**8** **[[Simulacrum (Spell)|Simulacrum]]****:** Creates a partially real double of a creature.

  **[[Aspect of the Iron Knight, Greater (Spell)|Aspect of the Iron Knight, Greater]]****:** You empower yourself with aspects of the iron golem.

**9** **[[Iron Body (Spell)|Iron Body]]****:** Your body becomes living iron.

**Source:** Sorcery and Steam (Fantasy Flight Games), pg. 110

GM Note

Deity: Gods of machines and craftsmanship.
